definition: midnight
night
variant of 夜[ye4]
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half

sentences.english: Sometimes at midnight when sudden moment wake up from any bad dream or any, Listen music-think definitely can sleep again (sound sleep).
sentences.chinese: 当夜半忽因恶梦惊醒，听这个音乐就可安然入睡。

sentences.english: At stoke of midnight God shall win .
sentences.chinese: 等到夜半钟响，上帝就会获胜。

sentences.english: Four times the Major Sabbats mark in the light and in the dark.
sentences.chinese: 四次大型的夜半集会做标记于光明和黑暗里面。

sentences.english: Comrade, I wish you bon voyage, be careful in the midnight cold north wind.
sentences.chinese: 战友，祝你一路平安，当心夜半北风寒。

sentences.english: In the middle of the night I was awakened by Judith poking me with her elbow and yelling at me to get up.
sentences.chinese: 夜半时分，朱迪丝用肘推醒了我，并大声叫我起床。

sentences.english: So, what left me is only the imagination, with wine, in deep nights, smiling.
sentences.chinese: 惟剩有，夜半独坐饮红酒，让想象任展歌喉，微笑着。

sentences.english: Midnight, a suds streamer, shine in the window, through the glass, in the bed.
sentences.chinese: 夜半，一沫流光，照在窗边，透过玻璃，洒落在床前。

sentences.english: Middle of the night, this time window is Inclined rain.
sentences.chinese: 夜半时分，此时窗外正斜风细雨。

sentences.english: But who was seeking the ancient poetry and in the midnight deeper to go into the lake and set free the boat?
sentences.chinese: 可又是谁来了觅古之诗情，夜半更深到湖里放舟去了？

sentences.english: Since midnight there was an endless succession of firecrackers being let off everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 自夜半起便听见爆竹，远远近近的连续不断。

sentences.english: In wine, and full waking lotus pond people move autumn wind.
sentences.chinese: 夜半酒醒人不觉，满池荷叶动秋风。

sentences.english: In the midnight, a string of hasty knocks at my door woke me up.
sentences.chinese: 夜半，一阵急促的敲门声把我惊醒。

sentences.english: At midnight, I open my eyes.
He usually went away about midnight, and returned to Courfeyrac's lodgings.
sentences.chinese: 他经常要到夜半十二点才离开，回到古费拉克家里。

sentences.english: As a result in the moonlight of deep night I seemingly heard of the camel’s bell coming from the prosperous time.
sentences.chinese: 于是，夜半月光下，我仿佛听到了汉唐的驼铃。
